narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Tiffany Darby is a Counselor, School provider based in South Euclid, OH. From 2018-01 through 2018-08, this provider received $93K in Medicaid payments across 1K claims serving 304 beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 98% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: 90837 (90837). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Billing stopped in 2018-08, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
